Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to subsection 4(3) and paragraph 5(b) of the Special Service Medal Regulations,

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: determines as special service, within the meaning of those Regulations, service which meets the following conditions:

Provision.Label: (i)
Provision.Text: it is an aggregate of 180 days of honourable service beginning on or after July 1, 2007 performed while deployed outside of Canada on a temporary basis, without family and effects, for the specific purpose of participating in or providing direct support, on a full-time basis, to approved operations,

Provision.Label: (ii)
Provision.Text: the service is not a posting to a permanent position outside of Canada, and

Provision.Label: (iii)
Provision.Text: the service is not counted as service towards any other Canadian or foreign service medal; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: specifies that the Bar that is awarded with the Special Service Medal, representing the special service referred to in paragraph (a), is to bear the word “EXPEDITION”.
